acerca.parrafo1: We are a team of programmers and artists established as a work cooperative, dedicated to the development of quality, reliable and dynamic interactive systems.
acerca.parrafo2: Collaborative work and a form of horizontal and democratic organization enhance creative and professional processes, allowing us to obtain excellent results in each project.
acerca.parrafo3: We seek to profile ourselves as cultural actors in the digital field and contribute with our work and experience to the development of our community.

portfolio.bajada: Web developments, web apps, games, custom developments, training, e-commerce, animations, advice, own projects, exhibitions, workshops.
